ValidationRule.description: Dates are locked in when Status is Reduction and Accepted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', NOT(ISCHANGED( Status__c )), OR( ISCHANGED( Confirmed_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( Conclusion_Date__c) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Reduction'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Accepted') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Effective and/or Conclusion Dates
